output:
I am alone in the night,
The silence a heavy burden to bear.
The stars so bright,
But none to share.

The memories still linger,
Of those who've gone away.
The heart feels a certain sting,
To face the darkness of the day.

But in the silence there's something sweet,
An opportunity to reconnect with me.
It's in this moment I find my peace,
Where I find strength and see what must be.

I may not have others by my side,
But I will never be left wanting.
For being alone is a beautiful thing,
And precious moments that life is granting.

So embrace the loneliness,
Allow it to be your guide.
And slowly you will find solace,
In the depths that it can provide.
